pages.text: Wo zhi jie an la de mingyi xuanjiang zhenli. Wo que yi gei nimen dai laile nimen de zhu de mingzheng, suoyi, qing ni rang yiselie de houyi tong wo yiqi likai ba!”
Ta [falao] shuo:“Jiaru ni dai laile jixiang, ni jiu xianshi ba! Jiaru ni shi chengshi zhe.”
Yushi ta [mu sa] jiu reng chu ziji de shouzhang, na shouzhang turan bian chengle yitiao zhenzheng de dashe.
Ranhou, ta [cong ye xia] chouchu shou lai, na shou zai guanzhong mianqian turan bian de jiebai yaoyan.
Falao de renmin zhong de shoulingmen shuo:“Zhe que shi yi wei jingzhan de moshu shi,
ta xiang ba nimen zhu chu nimen de guotu, nimen you he gaojian?”
Tamen shuo:“Qing ni zanqie bieguan ta he ta di gege [ha lun], qing ni pai chuanling guan dao ge chengshi qu zhaoji,
yibian tamen ba mei ge jingzhan de moshu shi dou zhao lai jian ni.”
Moshu shimen [ying zhao] lai jian falao. Tamen shuo:“Jiaru women huoshengle, women zhen de hui huode baochou ma?”
Ta [falao] shuo:“Shi de,[ruguo nimen huoshengle], nimen yiding hui chengwei wo zui qinxin de ren.”
Tamen shuo:“Mu sa a! Shi ni xian reng [biaoyan] haishi women xian reng [biaoyan]?”
Ta shuo:“Nimen xian reng ba!” Dang tamen reng chu shi, tamen [de moshu] mihuole guanzhong de yanjing bing shi guanzhong gandao kongbu, yinwei tamen biaoyanle da moshu [zhu].
Wo qishi mu sa:“Ni reng chu ni de shouzhang ba!” Na shouzhang turan tunmole tamen suo biaoyan de huanshu.
Yushi zhenli xianmingliao, tamen [moshu shi] suo biaoyan de zhishi tulao.
Tamen dangchang bei jibai, chengwei quru zhe.
Yushi moshu shimen zhihao baidao xiaqu.
